name: CategoryTheory.Limits.lim_ε_π_assoc
initialProofState:
J : Type w
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.SmallCategory J
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape J C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
j : J
Z : C
h : Quiver.Hom (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorUnit.obj j) Z
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Functor.LaxMonoidal.ε CategoryTheory.Limits.lim) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Limits.limit.π CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorUnit j) h)) h
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
lemma lim_ε_π (j : J) : ε (lim (J := J) (C := C)) ≫ limit.π _ j = 𝟙 _ :=
  limit.lift_π _ _

name: CategoryTheory.Limits.lim_ε_π
initialProofState:
J : Type w
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.SmallCategory J
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape J C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
j : J
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Functor.LaxMonoidal.ε CategoryTheory.Limits.lim) (CategoryTheory.Limits.limit.π CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorUnit j)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorUnit)
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
lemma lim_ε_π (j : J) : ε (lim (J := J) (C := C)) ≫ limit.π _ j = 𝟙 _ :=
  limit.lift_π _ _

name: CategoryTheory.Limits.lim_μ_π_assoc
initialProofState:
J : Type w
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.SmallCategory J
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape J C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
F G : CategoryTheory.Functor J C
j : J
Z : C
h : Quiver.Hom ((CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj F G).obj j) Z
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Functor.LaxMonoidal.μ CategoryTheory.Limits.lim F G) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Limits.limit.π (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj F G) j) h)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorHom (CategoryTheory.Limits.limit.π F j) (CategoryTheory.Limits.limit.π G j)) h)
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
lemma lim_μ_π (F G : J ⥤ C) (j : J) : μ lim F G ≫ limit.π _ j = limit.π F j ⊗ limit.π G j :=
  limit.lift_π _ _
